Package es.upm.dit.dscc.DHT

Class OperationBlocking

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upm.dit.dscc.DHT.OperationBlocking
  • public class OperationBlocking
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    aalonso This class implements a monitor for synchronazing threads It allows a thread to wait until the result of an operation is received. It is related to remote operations that requires to provide a response

      OperationBlocking()

      • OperationBlocking

        public OperationBlocking()

    • Method Detail

      • sendOperation

        public OperationsDHT sendOperation()
        Wait when a remote operation has been requested. The calling thread is continued when the operation is received
        Returns:
        The received operation

      • receiveOperation

        public void receiveOperation​(OperationsDHT operation)
        This method is invoked when a requested operation is received. Then, the waiting thread is unblocked
        Parameters:
        operation - The received operation
